The label is read in parts: "***BUTTERMILK PANCAKE & WAFFLE MIX***Net Wt 25 LB *** INGREDIENTS: Organic Whole Grain Buckwheat Flour, Organic Stone Ground Whole Wheat Pastry Flour, Wheat Gluten, Cane Sugar, Baking Powder (Monocalcium Phosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cornstarch), Sea Salt***Manufactured in a facility that also uses tree nuts, soy, wheat and milk***.

code_info: Production Code: ttttPS031481 where 'tttt' stands for the 4-digit time code starting with time code 0647 and ending approximately 0730. UPC on incorrect/old RSW secondary package - 012000100413    Best taste date code on all packages of JUN 18 18.
